ygData.subject: Re: FEIGN DEATH FAILURE!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: You re not alone.  Sence the patch I ve died about 4 times cause of FD failure.  I am level 30 and have now had more FD Synjyn has fallen to the ground
ygData.messageBody:
You're not alone. Sence the patch I've died about 4 times cause of FD
failure. I am level 30 and have now had more FD "Synjyn has fallen to the
ground" messges than I did between levels 20 to 30 combined.

I don't know what they did with the patch, but I do not like it at all. I'm
the puller for any group I'm with and it has really screwed up our hunting
with so many failures now. Its cost me my life too many times now and has
also cost my friends theirs too some because they rush in try'n to help me
when they see "Synjyn has fallen to the ground" and my life bar speed'n to
zero.

Synjyn DragonFist
30th Circle (STILL, ARRRR!!!!!!!)
Erollisi Marr
